title: Headhunter Akali Bug
body: Is anyone else experiencing weird effects with new akali on headhunter skin? I get weird red lines that shoot across the screen when i use her passive it seems. Not sure if i'm the only one noticing this. I'll try to get a screen shot uploaded

replies.body:
Hiya Rebel2112 - 

Thanks for the report! This is something we're aware of and are looking to get a fix in for. :)

You are not the only one
I notice the same
The other bug is that her R does less damage than support AA...
